FuncDef: This command configures the time the node waits for the response to an LSP Trace message discovering the path of an LDP FEC before it declares failure. After consecutive failures equal to theretry-countparameter, the node gives up.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the timeout parameter, in seconds, within a range of 1 to 60, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 30
